indications:
Indications HIV infection
in combination with other antiretroviral drugs
name: EMTRICITABINE
cautions:
Cautions 
(From Nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitors: British National Formulary)
Nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitors; also on discontinuation, monitor patients with hepatitis B (risk of exacerbation
of hepatitis); interactions: Appendix
1 (emtricitabine)
side-effects:
Side-effects see notes above; also abnormal dreams, pruritus,
and hyperpigmentation
